title: Photograph, View of the altar of an unidentified church, 1904–13
title_raw: View of the altar of an unidentified church
description:
Designed by Leon Dabo (1868–1960); for J. and R. Lamb Co.
Horizontal rectangle: Showing the altar and tabernacle. center panel, mosaic of the Last Supper; on either side, quatrefoil mosaics of a crown and leaves. A mosaic of the Sacred Heart and four angles on the tabernacle door. The feet of St. Peter and St. Paul, upper left and right.

Same church as 1961-83-16 & -17.

tombstone.epitaph:
Photograph, View of the altar of an unidentified church, 1904–13. Printed on sensitized paper. 
1961-83-18
